import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks';

<Meta title="Design System Overview" />

# TravelG3n Design System

This design system provides reusable UI primitives and layout components for the TravelG3n app.

## Primitives
- Button
- Card
- Navbar
- Sidebar
- PageHeader

## Tokens
- Colors: primary, muted, accent
- Spacing: xs, sm, md, lg
- Font sizes: base, lg
- Radii: default
- Dark mode: class-based

## Accessibility
- All components are tested with Storybook a11y addon.

## Interactivity
- Button supports pressed state and interaction tests.
